revised_title: Cereal Variety Identification and Grain Trading in the United Kingdom
tldr: This article discusses the challenges faced by the cereal grain trade in the United Kingdom due to the increasing number of cereal varieties. It explains how electrophoresis, a technique that identifies the variety of cereals, has become crucial for ensuring the quality of grains supplied to millers. The article also highlights the impact of the Common Agricultural Policy on the use of home-grown cereals and the importance of variety selection for farmers.
